Reviews.Title: Just what I needed
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: I am one of the many Virgin Mobile customer that is unable to make transactions through their website. I cannot use my debit card with them so my only two options are: buying it at an electronics store or online in another website.The fist option is virtually impossible since stores such as Bestbuy, Target, Radio Shack, etc. only have Virgin Mobile phones under $400, which are the older LG and Samsung models. However, I was lucky to find it here on Amazon.My main concern was wether or not it was going to work with my carrier because Virgin Mobile phones do not work with all the unlocked cellphones. But it arrived within the expected time frame, new, in it's original Apple box, and with the headphones and cords.It took me less than an hour to change my data plan, activate the phone on-line, and get the phone up and running.It is 30-50 dollars more expensive than on the Virgin Mobile website, but this was the only way I could get this phone and it was worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: crystal
Reviews.Content: wanted an iphone without the contract and i always had virgin mobile before so i was excited to know that they have iphones and i love it

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase Experience
Reviews.Author: Nina
Reviews.Content: The experience was a Great one! I was a little weary a first, this being my first purchase, and it being around the holiday season. However, the phone came much sooner than expected! It was here before Christmas and in perfect condition, with extra phone cases included with the purchase and accessories. Very Pleased with the product and the purchase.

Reviews.Title: No power cord?!
Reviews.Author: Jill L. Oldfield
Reviews.Content: For the money paid, it should have come with a power cord and ear buds would have been nice too.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Ana Lopez
Reviews.Content: I love this phone.  Very easy to setup, use and has a clear display.  I also appreciate how quickly it arrived.
